page.title: 13Libraries in Alford
page.content: The area is served by a mobile library and a public library in Alford. Later this year the public and school libraries will come together in the new Information Technology Centre at the Academy. In addition to books and records, computer programmes, videos and specialist information on view data will be available. Printing facilities, a mini TV studio, a meeting room with special audio-visual facilities and A/V equipment for lend- ing will be available to the public. Donside Community Council publish a newsletter called "The Coggie". In 1983 they published a collection of poems "A Balmy Breeze Frae Alford" by A.R. Birnie. Now they are planning an Upper Donside book aiming to interest visitors and natives in the history and physical nature of the area.
